sources.title: Bloody Mary Returns | Full Movie | Action Horror | Kelly Rian Sanson
sources.description:
Bloody Mary Returns - A group of vloggers is looking for the ultimate Urban Legend and soon discover the legend of Bloody Mary is very much real. Now, the group is stuck under her curse and will have to learn how to stop Bloody Mary once and for all before it's too late.
2022.  Stars: Amber Doig-Thorne, Kelly Rian Sanson, Leona Clarke
